author: Sudeep Jain
comment: I used to be a long time user of Nokia phones. When I shifted to Windows phone and later to Android, the one feature of Nokia I missed very much was the different profile. But this app is really at par with Nokia profiles. You can create new profiles & customise as in Nokia, even better. Really handy when you need to set volume levels at once. A big thanks to developer.
title: As good as Nokia profiles

author: A Google User
comment: Edit: Fixed stated bugs. Back to 5* Earlier: But for these issues, it could get five stars. Issues: 1. When you change the profiles that show up as shortcuts on homescreen, they don't change till you swipe the screen ... this wasn't the case before three updates. One tap on the profile and it would change asap, not now  2. The names change to stock name: 'Quick Profiles' and discard the ones that have been given. Pl fix this.

author: A Google User
comment: My profile switching application ever since I started using Android. It's been fairly reliable over the years. But I still have hiccups with setting display brightness.

author: Robin Gower
comment: Used to be a very good app but no longer works 100% with Marshmallow and my S7. Needs a bit of development.
title: Not up to date

author: Grigor Manev
comment: what I want - only manual switching. Like old good Nokia. Works great. Thank you! (Marshmallow, Galaxy S7 edge)
title: Exactly

author: Bob Smith
comment: Working ok in my Samsung tablet A6 android 7. One thing missing in setup is flight mode otherwise everything is ok

author: Ivan Ivan
comment: Great app, it's exactly what I needed. Simple and effective! It works on my Xiaomi Redmi 4x.

author: ΜΗΤΣΟΣ ΜΗΤΣΟΥ
comment: Show current profile on status bar to earn five ★

author: Anish Mathew
comment: Its an awesome app... But just missing the auto timer scheduler..

author: Nirose Chhukan
comment: Helps in making good profiles

author: Mike AirSushi
comment: Issues with LG V20. Sent email to developer. Have yet to receive response beyond automated email. Was 5 star now 2. Not the bug that irritates me so much as the unresponsive developer. Looking for different profile app after 3 using Pro version with the last 3 phones.
title: Doesn't work with Nougat well..... Developer unresponsive

author: Siddhant Maheshwari
comment: After recent updated version it has become very slow else I would have given 5 stars. Guys pls look into the matter.
title: Slow after recent update

author: A Google User
comment: After selecting a profile, it is reading my DND settings. I don't know why!! Rather It should leave other volume settings as is. Because of this nuance I have to enable the DND after I have selected a profile.
title: Why it resets other volume setting??

author: A Google User
comment: When I set ringtone to silent it changes to vibrate. Otherwise a nice update in my opinion. I went to another app due to issues I was having.
title: Can't set silent ringtone

author: Robert Walczyk
comment: Ringer mode setting always defaults to Ring & Vibrate; cannot disable vibration any more
title: Used to be better

author: Tony Audley
comment: I now use MY PROFILES.
title: Doesn't work.  Uninstalled.

author: A Google User
comment: Marshmallow fail. Notifications and Ringtones won't let you change directories or pick custom mp3 ringtones.
title: Ringpicker NOT fixed

author: Chris Williams
comment: Why change so much? Icons are too big, app is now slow, drop down menu doesn't change to show selected profile. Please put it back.
title: Horrible update

author: Stephen Simpson
comment: Used to love this app but the latest update has ruined it. Icons too big, much slower, loses icon display on home screen.
title: Update has ruined it

author: Adam Kutell
comment: Why change the great older layout?  I was able to see all my profiles listed and now because you made it only with the huge font I have to scroll around to choose my desired profile.  Quick Profiles is no longer quick to display or use.
title: Terrible new layout.

author: A Google User
comment: Latest update broken lock screen and pull down notification is gone. Was essential app, now dead. Cannot tell at a glance what mode I'm in and I rather not use widget .
title: No longer works

author: Mike Romine
comment: Lags when opening unlike the previous version.  Text and icons within the app are too big and don't follow the look and feel of android.  Please put it back, fix it or offer the old version.  This is an essential app and I'd be more than happy to pay for it as it was.
title: Dislike the latest update.

author: Eran Arbel
comment: The most important ability, to change the background, has been removed and the theme is now white with no way to change it so I'm blinded before i can set sleep mode.
title: Last update ruined a perfectly good app

author: Kunal Sarkar
comment: The latest version has too much width within themselves and in-between them. Due to this, 5-7 profiles which used to get fit in 1 screen, now needs further scrolling. Developer, pls roll-back or reduce the width so that 6-7 profiles can easily fit in one screen.
title: Too much vertically-wide profile names

author: Horia Matei
comment: Was it difficult to make it uglier? Uninstalling...
title: Getting worse

author: Michael Berndt
comment: Back on kit Kat this was a righteous app.  Just got a new Samsung S7 edge with marshmallow 6.0.1, and quick profiles doesn't work on it.  Then notice it's not been updated since 2012.  If you will fix this,  I'll come back.
title: Uninstalling

author: Oscar Cajada
comment: After the last update the Ringtone mode remains always as "Ringtone + Vibration", doesn't matter how many times you change it. Also doesn't look for notification ringtones in the notifications folder. What happened?
title: It use to work

author: A Google User
comment: Use it all the time, with modes for home, work, car, outdoors. Controlling: wifi, Bluetooth, vibrate, ringer volume, media volumes, etc. just wish had screen lock settings. Update - doesn't seem to control done if they newer apps I have.
title: Really useful

author: Steve Hooper
comment: Great App for controlling profiles, been using if for many years. I'm just not keen on Google's Material design... I don't like the enforced white background. If I could have a darker background I'd be happier!
title: Don't like the new design

author: Ivison Rutledge Bedard
comment: I downloaded this app to set up profiles on my phone. A feature i miss. The app does give you the ability to set up one touch profiles controlling most phone settings. However, it has a habit of changing settings at will. Like turning vibrate on ,which i hate, even though it is unchecked. Ringing when set to silent...this kinda defeats the purpose.
title: Meh

author: A Google User
comment: Needs Separate Vibration for calls and text. Phone either always or never vibrates unless you go into the message app and do it every time.
title: Needs 1 MAJOR Update..

author: James Ott Jr.
comment: I had this installed on an older phone. The app updated one day and I had this great new interface. I upgraded my phone and for some reason, I have the older black-themed interface. My family has the new interface still. I purchased PRO thinking that would change it, and I still have the older interface. I have no idea why
title: Weird thing happened....

author: Neil Fisk
comment: Not too bad. Icons need updating to be more in-keeping with modern Android. Widget is pretty basic. Why does selecting certain profiles automatically open the Play Store? Bad code...
title: I'd OK...

author: A Google User
comment: Was a fantastic app, was essential for my daily Smartphone use. Due to newer handsets and software it now has too many bugs, shame as l loved it so much l brought the pro version. Will keep an eye on it for updates but have to go and find an alternative for my Note ll.
title: Needs updating

comment: Originally thought charging just to get a widget was kind of silly.  But now think supporting dev is worth it.  I use the app constantly.
title: no widget, but...

author: A Google User
comment: Have been using it a while. Wish it could disable screen lock. Otherwise, does everything I need!  I've used it for years now and still haven't found anything better.
title: Long time user

author: Alex Patrenko
comment: I've used this in the past, it was amazing. Now however, most likely due to my outdated droid, the apps don't switch settings as it should. I have to remove. Still a good app, definitely try it.
title: Was Awesome

author: Jared Eaves
comment: On a galaxy S4 with Verizon.  Every time a profile is selected, I get an error message that says it "could not change wifi."  Bluetooth and other settings change just fine, but no wifi.
title: Good but...

author: Danial I
comment: Thought I needed to buy NFC tags to automate my profiles at home or in the car or at work.  This app no longer necessitates the need and is more convenient!  Would be better if there was an option for GPS however.   Also noticing the app hangs my phone once in a while in JB, requiring a reboot.
title: Very useful app

author: Craig Knapp
comment: Runs Great on my HTC One-X Quad Core.  Worth the price!  Finally, an APP that instantly turns off my Ringer Volume AND the Alarm Volume after creating a Profile I called MEETING.  So many APPs turn off or down the Ringer Volume but fail to control the Alarm Volume and I hate it when an Alarm Goes off during an office meeting.  To mitigate instances where I may forget to re-activate the NORMAL Profile I created (ringer and Alarm returned to 100 percent), and inadvertently have my morning alarm volume disabled, I use Timeriffic to automatically turn my Ringer and Alarm volume to 100 percent at 2000hrs daily.  Being able to create Profiles for Home (volume and alarm 100 percent, blue tooth off, wi-fi on, screen brightness 15%), Car (volume and alarm 100 percent, blue tooth on, wi-fi off. screen brightness 100%) is great!  I recommend upgrading to the Pro Version, you get a set of icons to display when selecting a profile, and the selected profile's Icon appears on the home screen, making it easy to verify which Profile is active.  Craig Knapp
title: finally an APP that turns my Alarm and Ringer OFF
